title: How to Make Weetbix Slice

steps.headline: Prepare the baking tray (sheet).
steps.description: Line it with baking (parchment) paper. Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF.

steps.headline: Place all of the ingredients except for the melted butter into a mixing bowl.
steps.description: Mix together well until all combined.

steps.headline: Pour the melted butter into the mixture.
Pour the Weetbix slice mixture into the baking tray (sheet).
steps.description: Smooth over to create an even topping using the back of a spoon or a spatula.

steps.headline: Place in the oven.
steps.description: Bake for 30 minutes or until the mixture appears bubbly.

steps.headline: Ice (frost) with lemon icing (frosting) once cooled.

text: Prepare the baking tray (sheet). Line it with baking (parchment) paper. Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF. Place all of the ingredients except for the melted butter into a mixing bowl. Mix together well until all combined. Pour the melted butter into the mixture. Combine. Pour the Weetbix slice mixture into the baking tray (sheet). Smooth over to create an even topping using the back of a spoon or a spatula. Place in the oven. Bake for 30 minutes or until the mixture appears bubbly. Remove from the oven. Allow to cool. Ice (frost) with lemon icing (frosting) once cooled.  Cut into squares for serving.
